item.title: Beocord 9000: Repair of a Broken Out Leaf Spring in the Tape Mechanism
item.description:
During the restoration of a Beocord 9000, a loose part was discovered within the device’s casing. This component turned out to be the left leaf spring responsible for securing the head carrier. A comparison with the corresponding right spring revealed that a small ball bearing, crucial for smooth head movement, was missing. Further investigation determined the ball bearing’s diameter to be 2.5 mm, and a readily available supply was procured. The broken plastic piece attached to the loose spring indicated that the original assembly, constantly under tension, had given way...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-9000-repair-of-a-broken-out-leaf-spring-in-the-tape-mechanism/
